name: Demo Music Game - 8ways
description:
It just makes visual effects like bluring, scaling by using frequency of music. I lost my all game files after my hard disk crash and I wasn't using any cloud system so I hadn't saved to anywhere.

You was be able to add your song and make something like ball that come from 8 ways also sync with beat like in guitar hero. You could add ball and other features manually then it saves to xml. I meant there was a editor for edit map for your music. However in the apk there aren't these features :(

Probably I was making this game in 2017 by using Unity3d. Now I just have a .apk not game files so I had to stop development
